citations.narrative:
Five Westie puppies housed on the porch had food bowls with shavings in their feed. Contamination of feed with a non-
edible substance is a potential hazard to the enclosed dogs. The licensee must use remove the contaminated feed, and
replace these bowls with more appropriate feed containers.
Correct from 8 February 2024 onward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
Sarah Roloff n

narrative:
3.9(b) 
   
Feeding 
Five Westie puppies housed on the porch had food bowls with shavings in their feed. Contamination of feed with a non-
edible substance is a potential hazard to the enclosed dogs. The licensee must use remove the contaminated feed, and 
replace these bowls with more appropriate feed containers. 
Correct from 8 February 2024 onward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Sarah Roloff n
